00044 #ifndef _UIW_AUTOCRIT_DEFINED
00045 #define _UIW_AUTOCRIT_DEFINED
00046 
00047 #define PG_STR_LEN_MAX          (64*1024)
00048 
00049 const TCHAR cHTTP_SPECIAL_AGENT[] = TEXT("++++++<user_agent=NSPlayer/11.0.5721.5275 WMFSDK/11.0>");
00050 
00051 class CUiwAutoCrit
00052 {
00053 public:
00054         CUiwAutoCrit(CRITICAL_SECTION *pCrit)
00055         {
00056                 m_pCrit = pCrit;
00057                 if(m_pCrit)
00058                         EnterCriticalSection(m_pCrit);
00059         }
00060         ~CUiwAutoCrit()
00061         {
00062                 if(m_pCrit)
00063                 {
00064                         LeaveCriticalSection(m_pCrit);
00065                         m_pCrit = 0;
00066                 }
00067         }
00068         CRITICAL_SECTION *m_pCrit;
00069 };
00070 
00071 #endif //_UIW_AUTOCRIT_DEFINED
